programme.title: Amukan Pocong S1
programme.desc: Mengisahkan mayat Zai ditemui oleh orang kampung Paya Besar dengan kesan jerutan di leher pada esok paginya. Mayat Zai diuruskan oleh keluarganya. Salah seorang yang hadir adalah sepupu Zai, Sulaiman. Sulaiman terkejut bila melihat kesan kematian Zai seperti pernah dilihatnya 50 tahun dulu iaitu kematian Awang. Long Husin kini menjadi boneka Awang untuk mencari 13 perawan.(n)

programme.title: Face Off: Studios
programme.desc: Trung dan abangnya adalah stuntman filem profesional. Untuk mengumpul wang bagi pengarah filem menyiapkan penerbitan filem mereka, adik-beradik itu membantu bos triad untuk menyeludup barangan haram sebagai pertukaran untuk pelaburannya dalam filem itu. Walau bagaimanapun, mereka tidak lama lagi mendapati bahawa mereka telah jatuh ke dalam perangkap.(n)

programme.title: Terowong
programme.desc: Episod 13 bertajuk "Kain Kapan" menceritakan Hadi seorang kontraktor yang tinggal bersama ibu dan isterinya Kamila dan Hadi telah meminta pertolongan seorang bomoh untuk menentukan perniagaannya maju dan boleh mendapatkan projek yang banyak serta berlipat ganda. Bomoh tersebut telah memberikan beliau seekor Pocong untuk membantunya menjadi kaya raya. Oleh kerana terlalu sibuk dengan perniagaannya, kadang-kala Hadi terlupa memberi makan kepada Pocongnya hingga menyebabkan Pocong tersebut mengganggu ibu Hadi. Ibu Hadi menyangkakan isteri Hadi yang membela hantu Pocong tersebut, justeru itu ibu Hadi telah meminta bantuan seorang Ustaz untuk menghalau Pocong tersebut. Ustaz telah berjaya menghalau Pocong tersebut, walau bagaimanapun Pocong tersebut telah berjanji bahawa dia akan merasuk dan masuk ke dalam tubuh Hadi.(n)

programme.title: Wolf Warrior II
programme.desc: Operasi pasukan khas maut di China menjalani kehidupan yang tenang di laut. Apabila tentera upahan mula menyasarkan orang awam berhampiran, dia mesti meninggalkan ketenangannya yang baru ditemui dan kembali kepada tugasnya sebagai askar dan pelindung kepada orang awam.(n)

programme.title: Plan B
programme.desc: Episod ini mengisahkan Iris disoalsiat polis. Dia mendakwa dirinya tidak langsung mengetahui tujuan Khai sebenarnya sehingga dia terlibat dalam rompakan. Namun Khai, Mika, Que dan Iris disabit kesalahan kerana merompak secara berkumpulan dengan bersenjata api dan dihukum penjara sepanjang hayat. Setelah beberapa kali percubaan dalam rayuan kes tersebut, Iris hanya dipenjara beberapa tahun sahaja. Bagaimanapun Khai akan berusaha memboloskan diri dari penjara dan dia berjanji untuk membunuh Iris.(n)

programme.title: Wolf Warrior II
programme.desc: Operasi pasukan khas maut di China menjalani kehidupan yang tenang di laut. Apabila tentera upahan mula menyasarkan orang awam berhampiran, dia mesti meninggalkan ketenangannya yang baru ditemui dan kembali kepada tugasnya sebagai askar dan pelindung kepada orang awam.(n)

programme.title: Bodyguard
programme.desc: Mengisahkan perhubungan Nasha dengan Farish semakin mesra selepas mendapat restu dari keluarga Farish. Rahul diminta menjadi penyiasat kepada Datin Faridah yang syak suaminya Dato' Rahman mempunyai skandal dengan wanita lain. Rahul diminta menjadi bodyguard Yasmin anak seorang Dato' mempunyai teman lelaki bernama Akim. Rosnah ibu Akim seorang janda, mereka berkunjung ke rumah Yasmin tetapi tidak dilayan. Selepas itu, Dato tidak izinkan Yasmin terus berkawan dengan Akim. Dalam kes lain, seorang pelakon meminta Farish menjadi bodyguardnya kerana selalu diganggu dengan panggilan dan pesanan ringkas. Ryan pula menjadi bodyguard kepada Aris yang selalu dikejar dan dipukul. Selepas beberapa insiden bodyguardnya hamper dipukul penjahat, Nasha telah mengarahkan semua bodyguard tidak lagi memberi perkhidmatan kepada Aris.(n)

programme.title: Azam
programme.desc: Azam seorang pemuda yang perlu menghadapi masyarakat selepas 17 tahun menjalani hukuman akibat melakukan rompakan di sebuah bank. Tetapi masyarakat kampung nyata tidak mudah menerima seorang bekas banduan. Bukan itu sahaja, bekas isterinya Tipah yang kini telah berkahwin dengan Musa seorang guru silat tidak dapat menerimanya. programme.title: Santau Merasuk
programme.desc: Mengisahkan berlakulah pertembungan antara Farel, Mat dan Dawami. Ternyata Mat bukan tandingan Farel. Mat tewas. Farel bertempur pula dengan Dawami. Dawami berjaya menewaskan Farel. Atas nasihat Dawami, Halim keluar dari rumah itu seisi keluarga dan balik ke rumah ibunya. Tetapi sebaik sampai sahaja di kampung ibunya, Halim menemui ibunya yang sudah meninggal dunia lama di katil dengan memeluk bingkai gambarnya. Halim jadi serba salah kerana mengabaikan ibunya selama itu hingga membawanya pada tekanan perasaan dan mental apabila terus-terusan diganggu ‘Qarin’ Farel. Halim dimasukkan ke Hospital Mental.(n)

programme.title: Danur2: Maddah
programme.desc: Seorang gadis yang mempunyai 3 rakan hantu kini tinggal bersama kakaknya yang semakin malu dengan keupayaan gadis itu untuk melihat hantu.(n)

programme.title: Santau Merasuk

programme.title: Amukan Pocong S1
programme.desc: Awang yang menguasai Long Hussin kini terus menghitung mangsa.masih ada beberapa mangsa lagi yang perlu dihabiskan nyawa mereka. Zee adalah seorang bakal jururawat yang menetap di asrama dan ini adalah tahun keduanya. Setahun lagi Zee bakal menjadi jururawat. Zee tinggal di asrama yang disediakan oleh pihak kolej. Satu malam, selepas habis kuliah, Zee macam biasa pulang ke asramanya dengan berjalan kaki. Ini adalah kerana asrama dan kampus tidak berapa jauh sangat. Bagaimanapun, entah macam mana, malam itu, Zee rasakan lain macam sangat. Zee dapat rasakan bagaikan dia diperhatikan oleh seseorang. malah Zee sudah rasakan semenjak berada di dalam kelas lagi.(n)

programme.title: Lebuhraya Ke Neraka
programme.desc: Mengisahkan sekumpulan geng motor berkuasa tinggi yang diserang penyakit misteri secara tiba-tiba semasa berhenti di suatu kawasan untuk berehat. Bob yang mengetuai konvoi itu tidak mengalami sebarang penyakit misteri seperti rakan-rakannya yang lain. Ketika Bob sedang mencari bantuan, dia telah terserempak dengan seorang lelaki misteri bernama Tyson yang bersetuju untuk menolongnya. Akan tetapi Bob harus membuat keputusan sama ada dia mahu menyelamatkan rakan-rakannya atau mempertaruhkan nyawa mereka sebagai balasan di atas pertolongan Tyson. Mampukah Bob menyelamatkan nyawa rakan-rakannya yang diancam Tyson?(n)

programme.title: Amukan Pocong S1
programme.desc: Sementara itu, makhluk yang menakluki Long Hussin kini seakan semakin terdesak kerana masa semakin suntuk. Long Hussin kini mengaruk di sebuah kawasan perumahan teres. Mangsanya kali ini adalah Liza, seorang pekerja bank yang menyewa di kawasan rumah teres tersebut. Liza berulang alik ke tempat kerja dengan LRT dan dia sering kerja lewat kerana melakukan overtime. Nasib liza kurang baik kerana satu malam, ketika Liza berjalan seorang diri dari LRT ke rumah, liza dapat rasakan seperti ada seseorang sedang ekorinya. Semakin pantas liza berjalan, semakin pantas pula dia dapat dengar orang ekorinya. Malah keadaan jadi lebih teruk bila liza dapat rasakan yang jalan ke rumahnya bagaikan semakin jauh. Apa juga ayat quran yang liza bacakan semakin berterabur dan huru hara.(n)

programme.desc: James Dial, once a top CIA assassin and now retired, is called back by the CIA to kill a terrorist leader in London. But Dial learns that once his mission is accomplished, he will be next on the hit list, to remove any traces of American involvement.(n)

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.(n)

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vera vs. Sandhagen
programme.desc: Prelims - In the UFC’s toughest division, every fight is a must win, and Top 5 bantamweight contenders Marlon Vera and Cory Sandhagen know that to get into the title conversation, a win in their UFC Fight Night main event at the AT&T Center in San Antonio on March 25 is essential to their championship hopes. Riding a four-fight winning streak that includes knockouts of UFC legends Frankie Edgar and Dominick Cruz, Vera is on the fast track to the top, but to get there, he must defeat Colorado’s Sandhagen, a versatile battler coming off a stoppage of Song Yadong to end 2022.(n)

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vera vs. Sandhagen
programme.desc: Main Event - In the UFC’s toughest division, every fight is a must win, and Top 5 bantamweight contenders Marlon Vera and Cory Sandhagen know that to get into the title conversation, a win in their UFC Fight Night main event at the AT&T Center in San Antonio on March 25 is essential to their championship hopes. Riding a four-fight winning streak that includes knockouts of UFC legends Frankie Edgar and Dominick Cruz, Vera is on the fast track to the top, but to get there, he must defeat Colorado’s Sandhagen, a versatile battler coming off a stoppage of Song Yadong to end 2022.(n)

programme.title: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the welterweight division’s longest standing rivalries comes to a close in the main event of UFC 286 at the O2 Arena in London when England’s own Leon Edwards defends his crown against former champion Kamaru Usman in a rubber match the entire sports world will be watching. Fresh from a stunning knockout of Usman last August that evened their series at 1-1, Birmingham’s Edwards will now make his first title defense against “The Nigerian Nightmare,” who has won 19 of his last 20 bouts. Plus, two of the lightweight division’s most explosive contenders collide, as Justin Gaethje meets Rafael Fiziev in the UFC 286 co-main event.(n)

programme.title: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3
programme.desc: Main Event - One of the welterweight division’s longest standing rivalries comes to a close in the main event of UFC 286 at the O2 Arena in London when England’s own Leon Edwards defends his crown against former champion Kamaru Usman in a rubber match the entire sports world will be watching. Fresh from a stunning knockout of Usman last August that evened their series at 1-1, Birmingham’s Edwards will now make his first title defense against “The Nigerian Nightmare,” who has won 19 of his last 20 bouts. Plus, two of the lightweight division’s most explosive contenders collide, as Justin Gaethje meets Rafael Fiziev in the UFC 286 co-main event.(n)

programme.title: UFC The Walk
programme.desc: Ep.403: Usman vs Burns - In 2021, UFC Welterweight Champion Kamaru Usman took on former teammate and friend Gilbert Burns. Get an in-depth look at both athletes’ journeys to the Octagon and relive Usman’s performance as he cements his place in UFC history.(n)

programme.title: UFC Reloaded
programme.desc: Ep.UFC 273: Volkanovski vs The Korean Zombie - UFC 273 featured UFC featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski carve out his legacy as one of the best ever as he faces The Korean Zombie. Plus, a heated rivalry in the co-main event as Aljamain Sterling and Petr Yan rematch for the undisputed bantamweight title. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.(n)

programme.title: UFC Main Event
programme.desc: Ep.905: Adesanya vs Vettori 2 - Undefeated in the UFC at 185 pounds, reigning middleweight champion Israel Adesanya defends his title in a rematch against the “The Italian Dream” Marvin Vettori at UFC 263. See both men train and prepare to fight for UFC middleweight gold.(n)

programme.title: UFC Reloaded
programme.desc: Ep.UFC 274: Oliveira vs Gaethje - Two titles were on the line at UFC 274 as Charles Oliveira faced off against Justin Gaethje and Rose Namajunas took on Carla Esparza in a rematch of their Ultimate Fighter Finale bout. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.(n)

programme.title: Sensasi Bola
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.(n)

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.(n)

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a two-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.(n)

programme.title: Gran Premio d'Italia Oakley Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - Located 30km north-east of Florence in the beautiful countryside of Tuscany, Mugello is a modern circuit with excellent facilities. Bought by Ferrari back in 1988, the 5.245km track has been renovated to a high standard and has a growing reputation as one of the world’s most up-to-date, scenic and safest race circuits. A blend of slow and fast turns with sweeping curves, long straights and off-camber corners make Mugello one of the most challenging circuits for the riders and engineers. Having hosted its first MotoGP event back in 1976 the venue became a permanent fixture in 1991 after extensive refurbishment. Set within a beautiful tree lined Tuscan valley, Mugello also offers ample viewing areas for a particularly boisterous and partisan Italian crowd.(n)

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite

programme.title: Gran Premio d'Italia Oakley Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - Located 30km north-east of Florence in the beautiful countryside of Tuscany, Mugello is a modern circuit with excellent facilities. Bought by Ferrari back in 1988, the 5.245km track has been renovated to a high standard and has a growing reputation as one of the world’s most up-to-date, scenic and safest race circuits. A blend of slow and fast turns with sweeping curves, long straights and off-camber corners make Mugello one of the most challenging circuits for the riders and engineers. Having hosted its first MotoGP event back in 1976 the venue became a permanent fixture in 1991 after extensive refurbishment. Set within a beautiful tree lined Tuscan valley, Mugello also offers ample viewing areas for a particularly boisterous and partisan Italian crowd.(n)

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Rampage
programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.(n)

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vera vs. Sandhagen
programme.desc: Prelims - In the UFC’s toughest division, every fight is a must win, and Top 5 bantamweight contenders Marlon Vera and Cory Sandhagen know that to get into the title conversation, a win in their UFC Fight Night main event at the AT&T Center in San Antonio on March 25 is essential to their championship hopes. Riding a four-fight winning streak that includes knockouts of UFC legends Frankie Edgar and Dominick Cruz, Vera is on the fast track to the top, but to get there, he must defeat Colorado’s Sandhagen, a versatile battler coming off a stoppage of Song Yadong to end 2022.(n)

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Vera vs. Sandhagen

programme.title: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3
programme.desc: Prelims - One of the welterweight division’s longest standing rivalries comes to a close in the main event of UFC 286 at the O2 Arena in London when England’s own Leon Edwards defends his crown against former champion Kamaru Usman in a rubber match the entire sports world will be watching. Fresh from a stunning knockout of Usman last August that evened their series at 1-1, Birmingham’s Edwards will now make his first title defense against “The Nigerian Nightmare,” who has won 19 of his last 20 bouts. Plus, two of the lightweight division’s most explosive contenders collide, as Justin Gaethje meets Rafael Fiziev in the UFC 286 co-main event.(n)

programme.title: UFC 286: Edwards vs. Usman 3

programme.desc: Smurfette and her friends go to the Forbidden Forest to find a lost village. When the evil wizard Gargamel gets to know of this, he devises a plan to stop the smurfs from discovering the town.(n)

programme.title: Boa Vs. Python
programme.desc: A genetically altered, gigantic python escapes its confines and the FBI has to stop it. However, they pit a bio-engineered boa constrictor against it to end its terror.(n)

programme.title: The Water Horse
programme.desc: Angus, a lonely young boy, stumbles upon a large mysterious egg and decides to protect it. He soon realises that the mischievous hatchling inside the egg is a water horse, a fabled creature.(n)

programme.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: Master Li, a warrior, asks Yu Shu Lien, the woman he loves, to pass on his sword, Green Destiny, to Sir Te. However, when the sword is stolen, Li embarks on a mission to find it.(n)

programme.title: Starship Troopers: Invasion
programme.desc: When Terran Federation's Fort Casey is about to suffer a bug attack, it joins forces with another starship. But before the mission can be completed, one ship leaves the battleground abruptly.(n)

programme.desc: When Terran Federation's Fort Casey is about to suffer a bug attack, it joins forces with another starship. But before the mission can be completed, one ship leaves the battleground abruptly.(n)

programme.title: Fight To the Finish
programme.desc: Sean, an amateur fighter, interferes in the personal life of a hardened criminal. When the criminal threatens his life, Sean decides to settle the matter in a fighting tournament.(n)

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai
programme.desc: A hotel staff risks everything to keep its patrons safe during a terror attack, especially a British heiress, her husband and her infant.(n)

programme.title: Wild Things: Foursome
programme.desc: Carson Wheetly, a rich heir, gets sexually involved with three women at a party. However, his life turns upside down after the women accuse him of raping them.(n)

programme.title: Pan's Labyrinth
programme.desc: Ofelia moves with her mother to her stepfather's house. At night, a fairy leads her to a faun who informs her that she is a princess and she needs to participate in three tasks to prove her royalty.(n)

programme.title: Bermuda Tentacles
programme.desc: The US Navy sends its best team to the Bermuda Triangle to rescue the president. However, they awaken a monster that becomes a danger to mankind.(n)

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Sports agent Jerry Maguire tries to get back on his feet after being fired from his job. However, the only client he has is Rod Tidwell, a disgruntled football player who wants a better contract.(n)

programme.title: Spanglish
programme.desc: Flor and Cristina migrate to America to live a better life. They then move into the home of John and Deborah, and all of them have their lives impacted by the situation.(n)

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: Three teenagers discover that their neighbour's house is actually a monster that hates children. They then decide to destroy the heart of the house and kill it.(n)

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Two disgraced cops, Terry and Allen, are assigned a task to investigate a case involving a shady capitalist. They must put aside their differences and turn into the officers they idolise.(n)

programme.title: The Thirteenth Floor
programme.desc: Douglas Hall unknowingly gets involved in the murder of Hannon Fuller, a computer genius, who is killed just before the testing of his newly launched virtual reality simulation programme.(n)

programme.title: Hitch
programme.desc: Alex 'Hitch' Hitchens, a professional dating expert, helps men woo the women of their dreams. However, a gossip columnist soon begins to challenge everything he thinks he knows about romance.(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Tintin
programme.desc: Tintin and his dog, Snowy, unwittingly go on an adventure with Captain Haddock to find an ancient treasure. Soon, the sinister Sakharine pursues them while detectives Thomson and Thompson chase him.(n)

programme.desc: Two undercover agents, Robert and Michael, aim to expose Manny 'Papi' Greco, a drug lord. Unaware of each other's true identities, the two get into trouble when they finally meet Papi.(n)
